name: Crowne Plaza Hotel Gurgaon

reviews.text: Back to Crowne Plaza for my second trip to Gurgaon after 5 weeks in October/November 2013, I was very much looking forward for another good stay and I wasn't disappointed.
reviews.title: Mostly excellent

reviews.text: On my previous stay, I had noticed few ups and downs and I was pleased to see that it had been corrected. Most people working in the hotel were already there last year and all of them recognised me and welcomed me back the instant I arrived. This is really pleasant and adds a real feeling of luxury. I was allocated a quiet room on the 5th floor with full view of the pool. Room was kept immaculate by a very nice gentleman, who would meet me with a great smile, every time I would see him around.
reviews.title: Fantastic business hotel

reviews.text: Service had been a little bit patchy in some areas, notably in Cafe G but this time it was really good all over and nothing was too much to ask. Food is as always the abolute gem of the hotel. Breakfast is superb but the buffet is beautiful as is all the "A la carte" dishes.
reviews.title: Great hotel with great service at a good price

reviews.text: Wildfire restaurant was a great moment again with the superb array of meats and the smile and kindness of the Brazilian chef.
reviews.title: Lovely property, great service, incomparable breakfast!!!

reviews.text: I will only mention one thing that is a let down for me. The hotel is a preferred location locally for corporate events and weddings. Smaller corporate events are taking sometimes place in Cafe G. In one particular occasion, we had to wait over an hour to get a table ...
reviews.title: very nice hotel to stay and enjoy holiday

reviews.text: I've stayed at this hotel many times, and have already reviewed, but felt my last visit worthy of another recommendation.
reviews.title: Amazing Service

reviews.text: First off, on arrival at 7am on Monday morning, while we could not take the room until 8am, we were sat down with coffee and biscuits, which was welcome after a red eye..... As ever, I was put in to a great room will all mod cons. Breakfast is continually fantastic, you can not fail to find something you fancy from Indian & Chines to US & English, fruit, bakery stuff, it's fantastic...
reviews.title: Best Sunday champagne brunch

reviews.text: The real reason for this review was that I got quite ill the night before my return flight. I was unable to fly the next morning, but the response of the hotel manager and staff was truly humbling, they could not do enough for me. They provided additional water, bananas etc, and offered the services of the on call doctor. The manager even called to check on me and to have his kitchen cook some rice or whatever I needed to help with my sickness.
reviews.title: A good place with best in class rooms but service is a bit slow

reviews.text: I can't speak highly enough of this hotel and particularly the service.
reviews.title: Decent stay in Gurgaon for Business

reviews.text: Excellent venue for Sunday brunch great value for money and fantastic service. Champagne flows freely. Staff are very attentive. Would recommend for anyone fed up of the over priced brunches in central Delhi.
reviews.title: Great Business meeting

reviews.text: First appearances are deceptive. A traditional hotel block next to a big highway does not make the heart soar. But it is a beautifully designed hotel inside. The lobby and bar areas is attractive. The pool and spa is fantastic - and well screened away for the dust and cars outside. The food is good. And the rooms are first class as well. For the many business people who come to Gurgaon its great choice.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.text: I have stayed 3 nights at the Crown Plaza Hotel Gurgaon, during a business trip to Gurgaon. What I can say about this Palace? that it was a great place with great people? that any Hotel personnel, from the front door security worker to the Hotel manager will do anything, and I mean a n y t h I n g, to make you feel that they are really care about you? so I am saying it loud and clear: it is a great Hotel! the room are huge, you will find all the newest technology and luxury: electrical curtains, seating area, working area, mini bar with drinks and snacks, free bottles of water every day, Stunning bathroom, Bath Robe, sleepers, and so on. The house keeping will make your room few times a day. The room was super clean. The breakfast is nothing but Deluxe. If you need or want something, just name it and see how they are working it out for you. The gym is located near the spa, and it is open from 0530 to 2300. if you are not looking to go there after midnight, it should comply with any schedule. The only issue, if I have to mention, is the Wi-Fi charge of 800Rp a day. 800 rupees are not a lot of money, but at this days Wi-Fi is like a towel or a pillow. You don't want to pay extra for a pillow, aren't you? So, if you are ever going to be in Gurgaon area, and want to feel like a King for few days without spending tons of Dollars, Crown Plaza Hotel is the place for you! Don't look at any other Hotel.
reviews.title: Luxury Hotel - Top Service

reviews.text: Have stayed twice at this place and besides being safe, staff is extremely helpful. Room serivice and restaurants are excellent. I had breakfast every morning and never got bored. For the price I paid, I would recommend this place. Its very close to Kingdom of dream and some close by eateries.
reviews.title: Excellent stay, food and safe

reviews.text: A classic hotel. For business or pleasure. Only 45 mins from the airport, a truly luxurious hotel. Sits bang on the National Highway 8 ensuring no crowded junctions to get in and out.
reviews.title: A pricey retreat but worth all the same :)

reviews.text: Huge rooms, excellent bathrooms, complete with remote control settings for curtains and blinds, BOSE sound system, DVD player, 37" LCD TV, soft king size bed, sofa, working desk, wi-fi facility, broadband in room, very clean and decent. Ironing board, electric kettle, min bar and wide selection of instant and natural coffee makes the stay perfect.
reviews.title: Convenient but badly maintained

reviews.text: Went to Delhi on quick business trip recently. Arrived in Crowne Plaza Gurgaon at about midnight and departed two days later. The hotel service was very good and the staff were pleasant, polite and efficient. The checking in was efficient and so was checking out, though my colleague was presented with a wrong bill when he checked out - good thing he caught it.
reviews.title: Solid business hotel

reviews.text: The room was nice and modern, but didn't know the curtains were controlled from a bedside panel. Looked for cords on the side and tried to jerk them open. Finally figured it out. Similarly, the bathroom had blinds that could open and view into the bedroom (or vice versa), that was remoted controlled.
reviews.title: Great services, excellent property!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only drawback was that the walk to the swimming pool was quite a ways. Had to walk down the corridor to lift, go down to 2nd floor then walk back down another corridor to the end where an elevator took it down to the 1st floor where the pool and gym were.
reviews.title: Great Food & Hospitality

reviews.text: As a gold member of Priority Club, I did not notice any special treatment as compared to my colleague who wasn't. In a previous trip to Crowne Plaza in Oman before I became a gold member, my travel colleagues were both gold and were upgraded to nicer rooms.
reviews.title: Efficient and courteous!

reviews.text: Nevertheless, I had a very decent room and the hotel made a very short and busy trip as comfortable as they could for me. Will definitely continue to use them.
reviews.title: good foood...good service

description: Crowne Plaza Today, Gurgaon offers an unique locational advantage to its corporate patrons by hosting them in the city centre of this business district, in close proximity to the domestic and international airport and right next to the 8 Lane expressway that connects it to New Delhi s commercial areas. The hotel has 234 large guest rooms that offer amenities like 37 plasma TV and a Bose Music system among others. The 11 versatile meeting rooms, with high tech features allow for corporate meetings and social functions of various nature and sizes, the fully equipped gymnasium, beauty parlour and spa offers after-work rejuvenation to the corporate guests, the club lounge presents a quiet get-away place to busy executives and these count among the high points that make this multiple award winning hotel stand apart in its products and services. The three restaurants of Crowne Plaza Today Gurgaon include the award winning Wildfire, the first and one of the very few authentic Brazilian restaurants of NCR, the ambience, food and service here reminds one of the churrascaria s of Brazil. CafÃ© G , the world cuisine ala carte and buffet restaurant and Connexions have also proved popular with the alert and exposed patrons who are loyal to this hotel.The contemporary structure, interiors and design adds to Crowne Plaza Today Gurgaon s charms and certainly helps to make it the proffered Place To Meet for elite clients like you.
